channel.title: [hyperion] Um will prbably sound noobish
channel.description:
well i started with hyperion yesterday i got it up running with IO eclipse.
i have added running and a yell command.
but i sill cant find out were to change the login text etc. like (welcome to runescape)
if i could find that would it be possibly to add like interfaces when u log in etc ?
would be awesome if someone could explain.
